an10.110:1.1: “Mendicants, these ten qualities should be blown away.
an10.110:1.3: For one of right view, wrong view is blown away.
an10.110:1.4: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are blown away.
an10.110:1.5: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
an10.110:2.1: For one of right thought, wrong thought is blown away. …
an10.110:2.2: For one of right speech, wrong speech is blown away. …
an10.110:2.3: For one of right action, wrong action is blown away. …
an10.110:2.4: For one of right livelihood, wrong livelihood is blown away. …
an10.110:2.5: For one of right effort, wrong effort is blown away. …
an10.110:2.6: For one of right mindfulness, wrong mindfulness is blown away. …
an10.110:2.7: For one of right immersion, wrong immersion is blown away. …
an10.110:2.8: For one of right knowledge, wrong knowledge is blown away. …
an10.110:3.1: For one of right freedom, wrong freedom is blown away.
an10.110:3.2: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong freedom are blown away.
an10.110:3.3: And because of right freedom, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
an10.110:3.4: These are the ten qualities that should be blown away.”
